title: Disney Lists $330,000 Crisis PR Job After CEO Insults Striking Actors and Writers
description:
Disney looks for PR help after Bob Iger, who earns $31 million a year, derided strikers as “not realistic.”

The post Disney Lists $330,000 Crisis PR Job After CEO Insults Striking Actors and Writers appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Medicare Drug Pricing Negotiations Advance
description:
Alex Lawson and Ryan Grim discuss the decadeslong struggle against Big Pharma to lower drug prices.

The post Medicare Drug Pricing Negotiations Advance appeared first on The Intercept.

title: As Republicans Thirst for War With Mexico, Democrats Push to Make Them Vote on It
description:
Populist Republicans’ response to the new war powers resolution highlights the growing pains of their anti-war coalition with progressive Democrats.

The post As Republicans Thirst for War With Mexico, Democrats Push to Make Them Vote on It appeared first on The Intercept.
